name: Lost (itch) (CreatorStudiosGames)
description:
IMPORTANT!

Make sure your device is an laptop/pc because this app works best on these two devices.

INSTRUCTIONS!

Up and down arrow keys and space to restart!

Hey! Welcome to my studio! My game is a really simple endless runner, this is my first ever game built in Unity so if there are any bugs please let me know. This game is purely built to enjoy and relax.  Please Follow, more amazing stuff coming up!
